name: In WWII My Grandpa Shot a T-Rex
name_original: In WWII My Grandpa Shot a T-Rex
description:
Your grandpa tells you about the time he shot a Trex in WWII but he is very inconsistent every time he tells you how many!

WASD - Move

M1 - Shoot

Scroll Wheel - Switch weapons

Credits
